content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_slab
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 31, "index": 11}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 56, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 14, "index": 29}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 21, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft purpur_slab, I first need to craft purpur_block which requires 4 popped_chorus_fruits. To make a popped_chorus_fruit I need to smelt a chorus_fruit. Therefore I will smelt the chorus_fruit in slot 16 into slot 12.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 16 to slot 12 with quantity 1

Ok
act: smelt from slot 16 to slot 13 with quantity 1

Ok

Ok

TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_slab
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 31, "index": 11}, {"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 56, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 14, "index": 29}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 21, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a purpur_slab, I need to craft a purpur_block. This requires placing 4 popped_chorus_fruit in a square shape on the crafting table. To do this, I will first place 1 purpur_block from slot 12 onto the crafting table at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_slab
inventory=[{"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 31, "index": 11}, {"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 56, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 14, "index": 29}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 21, "index": 45}]

thought: I have already placed one purpur_block on the crafting table at slot 1. The next step is to place another purpur_block to the right of it, so I will move the second purpur_block from slot 12 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_slab
inventory=[{"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 31, "index": 11}, {"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 56, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 14, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 21, "index": 45}]
thought: I have crafted 6 purpur_slabs, so I will move them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 6
